document_data.name: Raji al-Taqi
document_data.mainbody: '''Raji al-Taqi''' was an [[elven]] [[moralist]] who followed the teachings of [[Najm]] in [[Zakhara]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|208|[[Raji al-Taqi]]}}
document_data.Activities: Distressed by what he viewed as the fallen state of his [[pragmatist]] brethren, Raji believed that his actions would show them the true path to worshiping adventurous Najm.
document_data.Possessions: Raji wore ''[[armor of the desert evening]]'' and a ''[[shield of the holy]]''. He wielded a [[mace]] in combat.
